Articles.Content: TO ALL KERBAL MOTOR COMPANY FOLLOWERS, KMC IS BEING REPLACED BY KMC2 DUE TO SIGN IN ISSUES.

Hi KMC2, many members had their passwords break, if you are not receiving the password reset email PM me and I'll try to sort it out

I see you have reset your password and logged in as KMC, so KMC2 can be removed.
